all-furniture.Name: Shrewsbury Console Table with 2 Drawers
all-furniture.Body:

All these features create a piece of rustic furniture that is built to look like an antique, but with exceptional durability. An adjustable shelf is provided behind each door to allow various storage options. The sideboard is supplied with both wooden & antique brass knobs and finished with a rustic hand waxed finish.

Each of the two sections has a 60mm diameter hole cut out of the back panel, to allow cables to pass through. The paneled door can be fitted with either the brushed steel handle or wooden handle - to suit your styling. An adjustable shelf inside the cupboard space is ideal for storing DVDs & electrical accessories. The end grain of the corner pillars of the unit is visible from the top, giving a chunky appearance. The entire Lucerne collection is manufactured by skilled craftsmen using high-grade oak. A durable light lacquered finish completes the unit.

Min RRP  £242

All these features create a piece of rustic furniture that is built to look like an antique, but with exceptional durability. An adjustable shelf is provided behind each door to allow various storage options. The sideboard is supplied with both wooden & antique brass knobs and finished with a rustic hand waxed finish.

The piece is manufactured in oak, the base then painted in putty grey so that the texture of the grain can still be seen, the top is given a light grey wash. The range is characterised by rounded corners, classic moulding and a contemporary stainless steel handle.

colorado.Name: Colorado Chair Sofa Bed
colorado.Body:
The Colorado Chair Bed is a British-made fabric sofa and remains one of our most popular models. The sofa has a chunky square arm, contemporary styling and comes with various choices:

- Scatter Cushion

- Chrome, Light Wood or Dark Wood feet

and with a wide range of fabric choices. You will find that our body fabric choices are included in images - we will contact you upon order to check through all your options to make sure that you get exactly what you want. Please specify your main fabric on your order and we will send you scatter options.

Seat cushions are manufactured from high density foam and have a hand-rolled carded fibre topper which provides both softness and support.

This Chair Bed is made to order and current lead times are 8-10 weeks approximately. Delivery is included in the price.

The Chair Bed measures 130cm w x 98cm d x 96cm h

It comes with a scatter cushion.

We offer a deluxe sprung mattress option for everyday use - please contact us if you require further information.

Please contact us if you require any other information or delivery dimensions

lucerne.Name: Lucerne Coffee Table with Shelf
lucerne.Body:
The Lucerne standard coffee table with shelf will be the centre point of any sitting room. Not just a place for coffee or drinks but also somewhere to display photos or ornaments. The shelf is a handy place to store books, magazines or TV accessories. The Lucerne range is crafted using high-grade oak and features chunky legs with visible end grain at each corner and benefits from a durable light lacquer finish.

Dimensions  100cm w x 50cm d x 45cm h

lucerne.Name: Lucerne Small Cabinet with 1 Door
lucerne.Body:
The Lucerne small cabinet with 1 door is an elegant yet compact item of furniture, which will provide handy storage and contemporary style to the living area, bedroom or bathroom. The cabinet has an internal adjustable shelf, splitting up the storage space effectively. Both wooden and brushed steel handles are supplied and the high-grade oak is enhanced with a light lacquer finish. The Lucerne range looks just as great in a country home as it does in a city apartment.

Dimensions  40cm w x 32cm d x 70cm h

lucerne.Name: Lucerne Small Cabinet with 2 Doors
lucerne.Body:
The Lucerne small cabinet with 2 doors is an elegant yet compact item of furniture, which will provide handy storage and contemporary charm to the living area, bedroom or bathroom. The cabinet has two doors with an adjustable shelf behind each, splitting up the storage space effectively. The range features chunky legs with visible end grain at the top, and is supplied with both wood and brushed steel handles to suit your styling. The Lucerne range looks just as great in a country home as it does in a city apartment. The high-grade oak is enhanced with a light lacquer finish.

Dimensions 70cm w x 32cm d x 70cm h

lucerne.Name: Lucerne Small Console with 1 Drawer
lucerne.Body:
The Lucerne console table with 1 drawer & shelf is handcrafted from high-grade oak and features a contemporary styling. Designed to fit compactly against a hall or dining room wall this console table provides attractive storage space. As part of the top-selling Lucerne collection, it features chunky legs with visible end grain at the top, and is supplied with both wood and brushed steel handles to suit your styling. At the top of the unit, there is a spacious drawer that has been crafted with traditional dovetail joints. At the base, there is an open shelf, ideal for ornaments or books. The table is finished with a light lacquer finish.

Dimensions 60cm w x 30cm d x 75cm h

lucerne.Name: Lucerne Large Console Table
lucerne.Body:
The Lucerne large console table with 2 drawers & shelf is handcrafted from high-grade oak and features contemporary styling. Designed to fit compactly against a hall or dining room wall this console table provides attractive storage space. As part of the top-selling Lucerne collection, this console includes a range of design features: chunky legs with visible end grain at the top, and is supplied with both wood and brushed steel handles to suit your styling. At the top of the unit, there are two spacious drawers that have been crafted with traditional dovetail joints. At the base, there is an open shelf, ideal for ornaments or books. The table is finished with a light lacquer finish which enhances the grain.

Dimensions  90cm w x 30cm d x 75cm h

lucerne.Name: Lucerne Lamp Table
lucerne.Body:
The Lucerne lamp table with shelf is a stunningly crafted piece of oak furniture, ideal in the sitting room or hallway. In line with the contemporary charm of this top-selling collection, our skilled craftsmen use long-established techniques to ensure outstanding durability and strength. The table features chunky legs with visible end grain at each corner and benefits from a durable light lacquer finish. This contemporary design is just as perfect in a country home as it is in a modern apartment.

Dimensions  45cm w x 45cm d x 45cm h

lucerne.Name: Lucerne Nest of Tables
lucerne.Body:
The Lucerne nest of 3 tables features clean lines and a modern design with exposed end grain on the corner post details, they are the perfect combination that will suit any home. As with all products in the Lucerne range, the nest of tables is produced from high-grade oak, the grain is enhanced by the light lacquer finish.

Dimensions  55cm w x 40cm d x 50cm h

lucerne.Name: Lucerne TV Chest with 1 Door
lucerne.Body:
The Lucerne TV chest with 1 door combines contemporary styling with modern design to accommodate all the requirements of today. The unit has a fixed shelf, creating two openings to store media units. Each of the two sections has a 60mm diameter hole cut out of the back panel, to allow cables to pass through. The paneled door can be fitted with either the brushed steel handle or wooden handle - to suit your styling. An adjustable shelf inside the cupboard space is ideal for storing DVDs & electrical accessories. The end grain of the corner pillars of the unit is visible from the top, giving a chunky appearance. The entire Lucerne collection is manufactured by skilled craftsmen using high-grade oak. A durable light lacquered finish completes the unit.

Dimensions  90cm w x 45cm d x 50cm h 

Min RRP  £242

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury 6ft Bookcase
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury 6ft Bookcase is manufactured in oak, with a mid-oak stained finish. Characterized by rounded edges the bookcase has 6 shelves - 4 of which are adjustable.

Dimensions: 90w x 30d x 180h cm

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury 132/198cm Extending Dining Table
shrewsbury.Body:
This Shrewsbury dining table with 2 extensions is crafted from high-grade oak. Designed with practicality in mind, the table extends from the middle using two leaves; the leaves store neatly away within the table when not in use. When fully extended, the table can seat up to eight people comfortably. Finishing touches include softly rounded corners, chamfered edges and a hand waxed finish. Our rustic oak chairs are specially designed to complement the tables in the Shrewsbury range.

Dimensions  132/198cm w x 90cm d x 76cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury 120/153cm Extending Dining Table
shrewsbury.Body:
This Shrewsbury dining table with 1 extension is crafted from high grade oak. Designed with practicality in mind, the table extends from the middle using an independent leaf; the leaf stores neatly away within the table when not in use. When fully extended, the table can seat up to six people comfortably. Finishing touches include softly rounded corners, chamfered edges and a hand waxed finish. Our rustic oak chairs are specially designed to complement the tables in the Shrewsbury range. 

Dimensions  120/153cm w x 80cm d x 76cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Dining Chairs with Faux Leather Seat Pad (Pair)
shrewsbury.Body:
This pair of dining chairs are crafted from solid high-grade oak with a comfortable upholstered seat pad. The chairs feature chamfered edges and a durable hand wax finish which match the dining tables and other items in the range. These rustic chairs are strong yet comfortable and will give years of use.

Dimensions  53cm w x 45cm d x 105cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Standard Coffee Table
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury standard coffee table with shelf will be the centre point of any sitting room. Not just a place for coffee or drinks but also somewhere to display photos or ornaments. The shelf is a handy place to store books, magazines or TV accessories. The Shrewsbury oak range is crafted using high-grade oak and features chamfered edges, rounded corners and a durable hand wax finish.

Dimensions  90cm w x 60cm d x 50cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Side Table
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury side table with drawer is a beautifully made piece of oak furniture, ideal for the living room, hallway or bedroom. In line with the classic charm of this top-selling collection, skilled craftsmen use long-established techniques to ensure outstanding durability and strength. As part of the Shrewsbury collection, this Side Table has a range of design features including rounded corners and chamfered edges. It is supplied with both wood and antique brass knobs to suit your styling. The table is manufactured using high-grade oak and finished with a hand-waxed finish to set off the exquisite wood grain.

Dimensions 60cm w x 40cm d x 45cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Small Console with 1 Drawer
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury console table with 1 drawer & shelf is handcrafted from high-grade oak and features rustic styling. Designed to fit compactly against a hall or dining room wall this console table provides attractive storage space. As part of the top-selling Shrewsbury oak collection, it features softly rounded corners, chamfered edges and is supplied with both wooden & antique brass knobs. At the top of the unit, there is a spacious drawer that has been crafted with traditional dovetail joints. At the base, there is an open shelf, ideal for ornaments or books. The table is finished with a rustic hand-waxed finish.

Dimensions  60cm w x 30cm d x 75cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Compact Sideboard
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury compact sideboard is a compact yet elegant piece of furniture, which will provide compact handy storage and rustic charm to the kitchen, living or dining area. The sideboard has one drawer over two doors, the high-grade oak top has chamfered edges and rounded corners. Each drawer is solidly crafted using dovetail joints. All these features create a piece of rustic furniture that is built to look like an antique, but with exceptional durability. An adjustable shelf is provided behind each door to allow various storage options. The sideboard is supplied with both wooden & antique brass knobs and finished with a rustic hand waxed finish.

Dimensions  80cm w x 32cm d x 80cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Small Cabinet with 2 Doors
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury small cabinet with 2 doors is an elegant yet compact item of furniture, which will provide handy storage and rustic farmhouse charm to the living area, bedroom or bathroom. The cabinet has two doors with an adjustable shelf behind each, splitting up the storage space effectively. Both wooden & antique brass knobs are supplied and high-grade oak is enhanced with a rustic hand waxed finish. The Shrewsbury range looks as great in a country home as it does in a city apartment.

Dimensions  75cm w x 35cm d x 75cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Small Bookcase
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury small bookcase is a perfect compact storage unit for books, ornaments or photos. Handcrafted by skilled craftsmen from high-grade oak, this bookcase features smooth rounded corners and chamfered edges and benefits from a durable hand wax finish. The unit has one adjustable shelf for maximum storage flexibility.

Dimensions 50cm w x 30cm d x 85cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury 3 ft Bookcase
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury 3 ft bookcase is perfect for books, ornaments or photos. Handcrafted from high-grade oak, this bookcase features smooth rounded corners and chamfered edges and benefits from a durable hand wax finish. The unit has three adjustable/removable shelves for maximum storage flexibility. A classic bookcase perfectly at home in a traditional home or modern apartment.

Dimensions  90cm w x 30cm d x 90cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Display Cabinet with Glass Doors
shrewsbury.Body:
The original rustic solid oak display cabinet is the ideal way to show off your glassware, collectibles and finest china. Handcrafted by high-grade oak, the unit forms part of our top-selling Shrewsbury range. This range is characterised by softly rounded corners, chamfered edges and a hand wax finish. Each unit is supplied with both wood and metal knobs, allowing you to select the style you prefer. The Display cabinet has two doors over two drawers. Each drawer is solidly crafted using dovetail joints. All these features create a piece of rustic furniture that is built to look like an antique, but with exceptional durability. Three adjustable shelves are provided behind the doors to allow various storage options. This product is delivered fully assembled.

Dimensions  90cm w x 37cm d x 180cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Small Cabinet with 1 Door
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury small cabinet with 1 door is an elegant yet compact item of furniture, which will provide handy storage and rustic farmhouse charm to the living area, bedroom or bathroom. The cabinet has an internal adjustable shelf, splitting up the storage space effectively. Both wooden & antique brass knobs are supplied and high-grade oak is enhanced with a rustic hand waxed finish. The Shrewsbury range looks as great in a country home as it does in a city apartment.

Dimensions  45cm w x 32cm d x 70cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Standard TV Unit
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury standard TV unit combines the traditional charm of rustic oak with modern design to accommodate all the requirements of today. The unit has a fixed shelf, creating two openings to store media units. Each of the two sections has a 60mm diameter hole cut out of the back panel, to allow cables to pass through. The panelled door can be fitted with either the antique brass knob or wooden knob - to suit your styling. An adjustable shelf inside the cupboard space is ideal for storing DVDs & electrical accessories. The corners of the unit have been rounded to give a rustic appearance. The entire Shrewsbury collection is manufactured by skilled craftsmen using high-grade oak. A durable hand wax finish completes the unit.

Dimensions  90cm w x 45cm d x 50cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Nest of Tables
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury nest of tables is a classic item of traditional furniture which is ideal for modern living. The three different sized tables store neatly into one another to optimise available space. The set is manufactured by skilled craftsmen using high-grade oak. Design features include softly rounded corners and chamfered edges. These features create a piece of rustic furniture that is built to look like an antique but with exceptional durability. The set is finished with a rustic hand waxed finish, which gives depth and lustre to the exquisite grain.

Dimensions 55cm w x 40cm d x 50cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Lamp Table
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury lamp table is a stunningly crafted piece of oak furniture, ideal in the sitting room or hallway. In line with the classic charm of this top-selling collection, our skilled craftsmen use long-established techniques to ensure outstanding durability and strength. The table features smooth rounded corners and chamfered edges and benefits from a durable hand wax finish. This classic design is just as perfect in a country home as it is in a modern apartment.

Dimensions  40cm w x 33cm d x 40cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Console Table with 2 Drawers
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury console table with 2 drawers is handcrafted from high-grade oak and features rustic styling. Designed to fit compactly against a hall or dining room wall this console table provides attractive storage space. As part of the top-selling Shrewsbury oak collection, it features softly rounded corners, chamfered edges and is supplied with both wooden & antique brass knobs. At the top of the unit, there are two spacious drawers that have been crafted with traditional dovetail joints. At the base, there is an open shelf, ideal for ornaments or books. The table is finished with a rustic hand-waxed finish.

Dimensions  85cm w x 35cm d x 77cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury 2 Door Sideboard
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury 2 door sideboard is an elegant piece of furniture, which will provide not only ample storage but rustic charm to the kitchen, living or dining area. The sideboard has two drawers over two doors, the high-grade oak top has chamfered edges and rounded corners. Each drawer is solidly crafted using dovetail joints. All these features create a piece of rustic furniture that is built to look like an antique, but with exceptional durability. An adjustable shelf is provided behind each door to allow various storage options. The sideboard is supplied with both wooden & antique brass knobs and finished with a rustic hand waxed finish.

Dimensions  96cm x w 35cm d x 77cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Large TV Unit
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury Large TV Unit is designed for the perfect viewing of your widescreen TV. The centre of the unit features a shelving area and is designed to store your media appliances and entertainment units (a 60mm diameter hole cut out of each back panel, to allow cables to pass through). At either side of the unit, you'll find two generously proportioned cupboards, which are ideal for storing DVDs and accessories, each cupboard features an adjustable shelf. As part of the Shrewsbury collection, this TV unit includes a range of design features including rounded corners and chamfered edges. It is supplied with both wood and antique brass knobs to suit your styling. The set is manufactured by skilled craftsmen using high-grade oak and finished with a hand waxed finish to set off the exquisite wood grain.

Dimensions  120cm w x 45cm d x 50cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Corner TV Unit
shrewsbury.Body:
Handcrafted from high-grade oak, The Shrewsbury Corner TV Unit is designed to fit compactly into the corner of your room. The spacious top surface is perfect for a large TV with two shelves for your Media Box and DVD Player. Forming part of our top-selling Shrewsbury collection, the unit is defined by a beautifully aged appearance with softly rounded corners, chamfered edges and supplied with both antique brass and wooden knobs. The drawer is solidly constructed using traditional dovetail joints and wooden runners. The rustic hand-waxed finished set off the depth and lustre of the wood grain perfectly.

Dimensions 90cm w x 45cm d x 65cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury Coffee Table with Drawers
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury coffee table with 2 drawers features a traditional farmhouse styling with ample storage space. Handcrafted from high-grade oak with rustic styling, it displays a stunning array of design features including softly rounded corners, chamfered edges and dovetail jointed drawers. What makes this coffee table special are the double-sided drawers. Each drawer is solidly crafted using dovetail joints. The handy shelf at the base provides an ideal space for magazines and books. All these features create a piece of rustic furniture that is built to look like an antique, but with exceptional durability. The table is supplied with both wooden & antique brass knobs and finished with a rustic hand waxed finish.

Dimensions  100cm w x 60cm d x 50cm h

shrewsbury.Name: Shrewsbury 3 Door Sideboard
shrewsbury.Body:
The Shrewsbury 3 door sideboard is an elegant piece of furniture, which will provide not only ample storage but rustic charm to the kitchen, living or dining area. The sideboard has three drawers over three doors, the high-grade oak top has chamfered edges and rounded corners. Each drawer is solidly crafted using dovetail joints. All these features create a piece of rustic furniture that is built to look like an antique, but with exceptional durability. An adjustable shelf is provided behind each door to allow various storage options. The sideboard is supplied with both wooden & antique brass knobs and finished with a rustic hand waxed finish.

Dimensions  137cm w x 43cm d x 85cm h

sofa-beds.Name: Omega 2 Seater Sofa Bed
sofa-beds.Body:
The Omega 2 Seater Sofa Bed is a British-made fabric sofa and remains one of our most popular models. The sofa has a chunky square arm, contemporary styling and comes with various choices:

- Scatter Cushions 

- Chrome, Light Wood or Dark Wood feet

And with a wide range of fabric choices. You will find that our body fabric choices are included in images - we will contact you upon order to check through all your options to make sure that you get exactly what you want. Please specify your main fabric on your order and we will send you scatter options.

Seat cushions are manufactured from high-density foam and have a hand-rolled carded fibre topper which provides both softness and support.

This 3 Seater Sofa Bed is made to order and current lead times are 8-10 weeks approximately. Delivery is included in the price.

The 2 Seater Sofa Bed measures 185cm w x 97cm d x 96cm h

It comes with 2 scatter cushions.

We offer a deluxe sprung mattress option for everyday use - please contact us if you require further information.

Please contact us if you require any other information or delivery dimensions

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Small Cross Leg Extending Table 180/260cm
tuscany.Body:
The Tuscany small cross leg extending dining table is manufactured in a light, rustic oak. This chunky farmhouse-style table is perfect for large family occasions and can seat up to 10 people when fully extended. The 2 extension leaves can be used together or individually to create a range of different seating options, and both leaves store neatly inside the table when not in use.

Dimensions  180/260cm w x 100cm d  x 79cm h

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Oval Extending Cross Leg Dining Table 176/256cm
tuscany.Body:

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Coffee Table
tuscany.Body:

Dimensions  120cm w x 60cm d x 50cm h

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Nest of Two Tables
tuscany.Body:

Dimensions  60cm w x 40cm d x 55cm h

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Large Bookcase with 2 Drawers
tuscany.Body:
The Tuscany large bookcase is manufactured in light, rustic oak. It features 5 spacious shelves and 2 useful drawers in the middle of the unit. The drawers are crafted with traditional dovetail joints and come with a choice of round or square brass knobs. This is an ideal storage piece for any living room or home office.

Dimensions  119cm w x 35cm d x 190cm h

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Console Table
tuscany.Body:
The Tuscany 2 drawer console table is manufactured in light, rustic oak. It features 2 spacious drawers with traditional dovetail joints and is supplied with both round and square brass knobs. There is also an open shelf below for added storage making this an ideal piece for any hallway.

Dimension  100cm w x 45cm d x 79cm h

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Sideboard with 2 Doors and 2 Drawers
tuscany.Body:
The Tuscany 2 door 2 drawer sideboard is manufactured in light, rustic oak. It features 2 drawers made with traditional dovetail joints, above 2 spacious cupboards each with an adjustable shelf inside. This sideboard is supplied with both round and square brass knobs.

Dimensions  106cm w x 50cm d x 86cm h

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Cross Back Chairs (Pair)
tuscany.Body:

Dimensions  46cm w x 53cm d x 110cm h

tuscany.Body:

Dimensions  45cm w x 52cm d x 105cm h

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Large Mirror
tuscany.Body:

Dimensions  168cm w x 6cm d x 104cm h

tuscany.Name: Tuscany Hutch for 3 Door 3 Drawer Sideboard

This chunky, rustic piece is a great storage solution when paired with the Tuscany 2 Door 2 Drawer Sideboard, and is supplied with both round and square brass knobs.
